      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  AuthenticatedEnc 
      interface  CBCEnc 
      interface  CTREnc
      Any implementation of Symmetric encryption in Counter-Mode ash to implement this interface.
      interface  SymAdditiveHomomorphicEnc
      General interface for symmetric additive homomorphic encryption.
      interface  SymMultiplicativeHomomorphicEnc
      General interface for symmetric multiplicative homomorphic encryption.
      Classes in edu.biu.scapi.midLayer.symmetricCrypto.encryption that implement SymmetricEnc 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  OpenSSLCBCEncRandomIV
      This class performs the Cipher Block Chaining (CBC) Mode encryption and decryption, using OpenSSL library.
      class  OpenSSLCTREncRandomIV
      This class performs the randomized Counter (CTR) Mode encryption and decryption, using OpenSSL library.
      class  OpenSSLEncWithIVAbs
      This is an abstract class that manage the common behavior of symmetric encryption using Open SSL library.
      class  ScCBCEncRandomIV
      This class performs the Cipher Block Chaining (CBC) Mode encryption and decryption.
      class  ScCTREncRandomIV
      This class performs the randomized Counter Mode encryption and decryption.
      class  ScEncryptThenMac
      This class implements a type of authenticated encryption: encrypt then mac.

      Constructor and Description
      ScEncryptThenMac(SymmetricEnc encryptor, Mac mac)
